body_html:
That's right. The following changes fixed the problem on gcc 4.8.2

replace
using typename BinaryLinearAlgebraOp<Scalar, SupportsBatchOperationT>::Matrix;
using typename BinaryLinearAlgebraOp<Scalar,
SupportsBatchOperationT>::MatrixMap;
using typename BinaryLinearAlgebraOp<Scalar,
SupportsBatchOperationT>::ConstMatrixMap;

with

typedef typename BinaryLinearAlgebraOp<Scalar, SupportsBatchOperationT>::Matrix Matrix;
typedef typename BinaryLinearAlgebraOp<Scalar,
SupportsBatchOperationT>::MatrixMap MatrixMap;
typedef typename BinaryLinearAlgebraOp<Scalar,
SupportsBatchOperationT>::ConstMatrixMap ConstMatrixMap;
